SELECT (select dict_label from sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'login_way' and dict_value = log.loginWay) as loginWay, loginAddress as address, loginSystem as loginSystem, loginTime FROM m_user_login_log as log where yhnm = #{yhnm} and logintype = '1' order by loginTime desc
limit #{page}, #{limit}
SELECT count(1) FROM m_user_login_log as log where yhnm = #{yhnm} and logintype = '1'
select count(1) from m_user where yhnm = #{yhnm} and email is not null
select count(1) from m_user where yhnm = #{yhnm} and password is not null

select com.commentId, (case when com.commentType = '1' then art.articleTitle else '留言反馈' end) as articleName, art.wznm, com.commentType, DATE_FORMAT(com.submitTime, '%Y-%m-%d') as commentTime, com.commentContent as comments, m.nickname as commitName, m1.nickname as replyName, icon.iconUrl as icon from sys_comment com left join sys_comment com1 on com.replyId = com1.commentId left join sys_article art on com.wznm = art.wznm left join m_user m on m.yhnm = com.submitPerson left join m_user m1 on m1.yhnm = com1.submitPerson left join m_user_icon icon on m.yhnm = icon.yhnm and isActivity = '1' where com.submitPerson = #{yhnm} order by com.submitTime desc
limit #{page}, #{limit}
select count(1) from sys_comment com where com.submitPerson = #{yhnm}

select id as linkId, title as linkName, url as linkUrl, (select dict_label from sys_dict_data where dict_type = 'link_audit_status' and dict_value = link.auditStatus) as linkStatus, auditReason as feedbackMsg from sys_links link where submitPerson = #{yhnm} and auditStatus = #{linkStatus} order by link.submitTime desc
select id as linkId, title as linkName, url as linkUrl, intro as intro from sys_links link where id = #{linkId}
mapper.update: update m_user set sex = #{sex}, nickName = #{nickName}, realName = #{realName}, area = #{area}, birthday = #{birthday}, workTime = #{workTime}, professional = #{professional}, company = #{company}, signature = #{signature}, yhnm = #{yhnm} where yhnm = #{yhnm}
mapper.select: select sex, nickname, realName, area, DATE_FORMAT(birthday,'%Y-%m-%d') as birthday, DATE_FORMAT(workTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as workTime, professional, company, signature from m_user where yhnm = #{yhnm}
select count(1) from web_dynamic where operYhnm = #{operYhnm}

select web.*, m1.nickname as commentName, m.nickName, CONCAT('/profile/', iconUrl) as nickIcon from web_dynamic web left join m_user m on web.operYhnm = m.yhnm left join m_user m1 on web.commentYhnm = m1.yhnm left join m_user_icon icon on icon.yhnm = m.yhnm and isActivity = '1' where operYhnm = #{operYhnm} order by operTime desc
limit #{page}, #{limit}
